function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate q values for specific respiratory infectious diseases","Impact":"Inaccurate prediction of infection risk, leading to potential unmitigated transmission","Mitigation":"Calibrate q values using real pandemic cases and verify with existing cases","Technologies":"Model calibration and verification tools","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Variation of q value in different spaces with different population densities and ventilation systems","Impact":"Inconsistent infection risk predictions for different spaces","Mitigation":"Perform trial calculations to determine q values for specific spaces and population densities","Technologies":"Simulation and modeling software","People":"Architects, building engineers, facility managers","Owner":"Building owners, facility management companies"},{"Description":"Failure to consider factors other than ventilation rate in the Wells-Riley model","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of infection risk in confined spaces","Mitigation":"Introduce additional indices (Pd and Ez) into the model to account for other factors","Technologies":"Model enhancement software","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"}]}
